Exclusive Chef’s Table at Dolce Vita
Mandarin Oriental, Singapore is delighted to launch an exclusive Chef’s Table dining experience at Dolce Vita, helmed by Chef de Cuisine Omar Bernardi.
Guests will be in for a pleasant surprise with the six-course menu served “OMAR-kase”-
style, emulating the Japanese “omakase” concept, which literally translates to “I will leave it to you”, as Chef Omar delights diners with his delectable selection of authentic Italian dishes.
Ideal for intimate dinner gatherings, guests will be seated around the show kitchen and
treated to a multi-sensory culinary feast, where they will have the opportunity to interact with Chef Omar while he whips up a delicious meal right before their eyes. With his affable
personality, Chef Omar will present a showcase of tantalising monthly signature creations
prepared with fresh seasonal ingredients.
Guests can look forward to taking the Chef’s Table up a notch, as each course has also been
paired with the exquisite wines from an award-winning wine list, carefully curated by the
hotel’s sommelier. Enticing mocktails have also been concocted for those with preference for non-alcoholic beverages to fully indulge in the unique “OMAR-kase” dining experience.
Available every Friday evening, the Chef’s Table can only accommodate up to six guests,
and is priced at SGD 150 per person, inclusive of wine pairing.
Source:- Mandarian Oriental
